summary: App should open directly with no authentication; remove the canister system permanently.
architectural_notes: App must allow direct access with no authentication (no CTR, access code, email/password, or face authentication).
Canister system is to be removed permanently; ensure dependent flows are deleted/disabled.

existing_features.title: Remove all user-facing authentication and verification flows so users can access the app immediately without any login steps, including: CTR ID, access code, email/password, face authentication, and any Internet Identity sign-in UI.
Remove CTR/access-code related validation utilities and any UI logic that depends on them so the app no longer enforces CTR ID allowlists or shared access-code allowlists.

Eliminate the canister/connection configuration system from the end-user experience by removing any connection/config initialization banners, backend reachability banners, offline mode notices, and any connection settings panels from the rendered UI so the app does not present canister configuration as a user task.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all authentication methods (CTR, access code, email/password, face authentication) so users can access the app directly.
Remove the canister system permanently from the app.

Remove any feature gating or conditional navigation that depends on authentication, identity state, CTR connection, access code validation, or connection state, and ensure all primary sections (Stocks & Funds, Withdrawal, Customer Support) are accessible immediately on app load.

Remove backend-side authorization requirements so all backend methods used by the app work for anonymous callers, and preserve compatibility with the existing frontend actor creation by keeping any previously-exposed initialization method as a no-op if it is still referenced by generated interfaces.

projectName: Remove all authentication flows and eliminate canister/connection system so the app opens directly
